channel.title: Zedania Alpha 0.1 (RPG/Survival)
channel.description:
Zedania. A server under development meant to be the perfect mixture of RPG, survival, and something one-of-a-kind ;).
Zedania is currently in just Alpha development, I wasn't even going to start it up but I figured I'll let people play while it's under construction, why not?
This server currently does NOT need a custom client, but soon very well could, I will be adding custom graphics, sprinting (which is client-sided, you currently can't sprint due to my custom hunger removal, it's not that big of a deal though).
We feature a leveling system with custom and semi-randomized EXP, you get EXP for breaking blocks and killing mobs.
I hope to see you on this server, it's going places, so be able to say you've played it back in the very first release stage.
IP: lulzproject.no-ip.org

item.title: Zedania Alpha 0.1 (RPG/Survival)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

A tip for your hunger removal, just make it send a packet to the client stating hunger is at 20 (max) and it should be fine.

Read full topic
